name: Tappy Unicorn
description:
+++ Introduction

Sheila the Unicorn on her 2nd adventure. After saving the people from an exploding planet, it is now up to her to escape the ultimate doom. Help her to pass the obstacle course and avoid hitting the buildings. Figure out the sweet spot between not jumping jumping.

This game is a challenge, so expect to be challenged.

This game uses a simple control mechanic. Tap the screen to give Sheila a bump into the air. Carefully control her height and jump through the building openings.

If you want to compare your highscore across players and receive achievements, you need to enable play games services and allow others to see your score activity.

+++ Controls

Well, everybody should know^^ This is my attempt to flappy bird. Click to jump.

+++ Links

Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.deichkrieger.tappyUnicorn&hl=gs...

App Store: https://apps.apple.com/sg/app/tappy-unicorn/id1499309585
